backend/main.mo: Motoko chat backend managing rooms, messages, reactions, media blobs, and nickname lookups with create, validate, post, fetch, and edit operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components involved in enabling Reply on all messages, including the message UI file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing roles of all frontend files such as hooks, components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme styles defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling theme, room routing via URL hash, and layout including header and conditional footer.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown button allowing users to switch between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Me: UI component for composing and sending messages with optional file uploads, paste handling, and reply support.
Renders an individual chat message with editing, deleting, media display, reactions, and retry logic for optimistic messages.
frontend/src/features/chat/reactions/Rea: Displays reaction buttons for a message and allows users to add emoji reactions via a popover.
frontend/src/features/chat/RoomPage.tsx: Chat room view handling room validation, message fetching, reply context lookup, and rendering message list and composer.
frontend/src/features/chat/types/chatMes: Defines extended chat message types with optimistic update fields and helpers for identifying unsent messages.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/display: Returns a safe display name for a message sender, defaulting to 'Anonymous' when needed.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/downloa: Provides helpers to trigger file downloads and derive file extensions from MIME types.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/message: Maps backend and network errors to concise, user-friendly error messages.
Implements stable sorting and merging logic for backend and optimistic chat messages.
frontend/src/features/lobby/EditNickname: Inline UI component for editing, saving, or clearing a user's nickname.
frontend/src/features/lobby/LobbyPage.ts: Lobby interface enabling nickname setup, room creation, room joining, and validation before entering a chat room.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing the user's identity along with login and logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Manages a locally stored userId and nickname using localStorage and exposes setters for nickname updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for rooms, messages, validation, and posting messages, integrating with the backend actor and supporting optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for themes, chat bubble colors, and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors from CSS variables, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, issues, and architecture notes for the anonymous chat app.
